column1: I am driven by a desire to help others. I think about others needs more than my own.
I am driven by a desire to understand how things work. Knowing the truth is important to me.
I am driven by my own goals and visions. I want to create the life I see for myself.
I am driven by my own feelings and values. I need to be true to myself.
I am driven by a need to get things done. I want to succeed more than anything else.
I am driven by a desire for stability.  I stick to what I know.
I am driven by new possibilities.  My mind is always thinking up new ideas.
I am driven by enjoying the current moment.  I make the most of every experience.
